name.ja: <ruby>真<rt>しん</rt></ruby>・<ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>覇<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby>ライガオン

requirement.en: Send 1 other face-up Beast-Warrior Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the original ATK of the monster sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a card in your Field Zone, you can change the battle position of 1 monster on your opponent's field.
